name: KYPECO
0:
”Alexa, ask production manager what is the OEE of line one?”
”Alexa, ask production manager to provide shift briefings.”
”Alexa, ask production manager about job order number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: production manager
des:
Kypeco is a ground-breaking technical eco-system which helps establishing key principals laid by Industry 4.0 and bridging the gap of the cyber-physical production system. It enables manufacturers of all sectors to get the genealogy of their production environment.

Have you ever wished to have a personal assistant, specially trained for manufacturing industry, to provide you regular production updates. How about shift briefings, when Kypeco can provide intelligent insights without having to go through multiple reports.
Hourly production updates is another great example where Kypeco can highlight major downtimes, updates on Line OEE, estimated end-time on the running jobs etc.
 
Time for legacy, rigid and siloed manufacturing process control systems to give way to the advanced decentralised intelligence, as insights driven planning blaze the train in production.

Say Alexa, ask production manager (or open production manager) to start the interaction.
